channel.title: Libtpms on Kip Jiang
channel.description: Recent content in Libtpms on Kip Jiang

item.title: Virtual Machine with vTPM in Ubuntu
item.description: Preparation Reference Paper Scalable attestation: A step toward secure and trusted clouds. In 2015 IEEE International Conference on Cloud Engineering _ Berger, etc., 2015, March. PDF Environment Host: Ubuntu 18.04 Guest: Ubuntu 14.04 Source Code seabios-tpm libtpms swtpm qemu-tpm Tree of Path 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 kip └── workspace ├── libtpms ├── qemu-tpm ├── seabios ├── swtpm └── test SeaBIOS SeaBIOS 包含 vTPM 支持的分支 seabios-tpm 最开始由 Stefan 维护，现在已经成功将其合并到主分支 SeaBIOS。因此，下面的实验中我们使用其主分支。
